posts.content: What's the ROI of thought leadership and why might our focus on attribution hurt us? One of IBM's CMOs, Cindy Anderson, said it best."ROI = influence that moves people toward the buying decision, over time. Thought leadership warms the room before you enter it."IBM's research of 4000 C-Suites, avg revenue 29B, found that 87% made a specific purchasing decision within 90 days of consuming thought leadership, part of why we've seen a surge in CXOs joining LinkedIn as their primary delivery vehicle
